HomePage.name: Mateus Henrique da Silva
HomePage.title: Fullstack Developer
HomePage.description: I build applications from scratch with a simple and efficient approach for the business.

summary.item1: I’m Mateus, a Systems Analysis and Development graduate with over five years of experience in developing complete applications. Throughout my career, I have worked with modern technologies such as Node.js, React, and Spring Boot, and have solid experience with databases like PostgreSQL. In addition, I possess strong knowledge in serverless API development using AWS Lambda and cloud infrastructure.
summary.item2: My journey includes creating systems tailored to business needs, such as a help desk system that was widely adopted and expanded within my current company to cover various departments. I am also a full-stack developer, with experience in building applications using React and Node.js, as well as executing projects with monorepos and the Next.js framework.
summary.item3: I’m known for my communication and teamwork skills, which have enabled me to successfully work in agile environments and tackle various software challenges. Recently, I’ve focused on deepening my Java knowledge, particularly in applications using Spring Boot, to further enhance my backend expertise.

experience1.title: Mid-level IT Analyst
experience1.description: I work as a Mid-level IT Analyst, responsible for contract management and leading internal and third-party projects. I have experience as a full stack developer, creating complete solutions with Node.js on the backend, Next.js on the frontend, and PostgreSQL/MySQL databases. I provide user support for the Datasul ERP, participate in the implementation of modules and configurations, and develop custom reports to meet specific business needs. I work with serverless APIs on AWS, perform cloud deployments, and utilize virtual machines, as well as employing GIT for version control. I develop APIs with Node.js and Java (Spring Boot) and conduct requirements gathering to ensure that projects meet business needs. My work spans from planning to delivery, always aiming for efficiency and high value.
